phrs.headword: funeral and inter we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao

sentences.sentence: One January, I had to officiate at two funerals on successive days for two elderly women in my community.
sentences.translation: 在某个1月，我不得不连续两天为我们社区的两名老年妇女主持两场葬礼。

sentences.sentence: "People go at the special times—Christmas, Easter, and baptisms, weddings, funerals," notes the Reverend Christina Berglund.
sentences.translation: “人们在圣诞节、复活节、洗礼、婚礼和葬礼这样特殊的时间去教堂。” Christina Berglund 牧师说。
我们要未来，而不是葬礼！
